sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO JDBC_BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_CNT, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES( board_seq.nextval, #BOARD_TITLE#, #BOARD_WRITER#, sysdate, 0, #BOARD_CONTENT# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE JDBC_BOARD SET board_title = #board_title#, board_date = sysdate, board_content = #board_content# WHERE board_no = #board_no#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM JDBC_BOARD ORDER BY board_no DESC
SELECT board_no, board_title, board_writer, to_char(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') board_date, board_cnt, board_content FROM JDBC_BOARD WHERE board_no = #board_no#
SELECT board_no, board_title, board_writer, to_char(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') board_date, board_cnt, board_content FROM JDBC_BOARD WHERE board_title like %#board_title#% ORDER BY board_no DESC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE JDBC_BOARD SET board_cnt = #board_cnt + 1#, WHERE board_no = #board_no#
